page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.

page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: PCI - GRA1 - host673267
incidents.message:
Incident full recovery: 13:10 UTC
Root cause of incident: Host hardware (disk) failure
Advice: Customers are recommended to check their instances. If customers have a more up to date backup than what has been restored, we advised using your more up-to-date backups.

incidents.name: [GRA9][Network/Containers & Orchestration] - API - Control plane
incidents.message: Start Time : 17/06/2022 09:27 UTC End Time : 17/06/2022 10:20 UTC Service impact : Operations such as port creations/deletions/attachment/detachment and spawning of instances were giving an error and the API may have gone down. Also, some customer's control plane might been in a degraded state, all management operations on nodes were impacted and delivery of new clusters was not working. Root cause :API requests couldn't be processed due to issues with the rabbitmq cluster.

incidents.name: [GRA7][Public cloud] - K8S volumes management slowed down
incidents.message: Start Time : 06/06/2022 08:00 UTC End Time : 06/06/2022 12:23 UTC Service impact : The creation, deletion, attachment and detachment of kubernetes volumes were slowed down. Volumes newly created may have ended up in error state.

incidents.name: [GRA7][Storage] - Volume snapshot
incidents.message: Start time : 03/06/2022 16:00 UTC End time : 03/06/2022 20:13 UTC Service impact : Slowdowns may have been observed on any action on a OpenStack volume. Our technical teams resolved the issue. Performance are back to their levels prior the incident.

incidents.name: [Global][Kubernetes] - Openstacks API
incidents.message:
Everything is observed working as prior the incident.
We are closing the monitoring.

incidents.name: [Global][Public Cloud] - Openstacks API
incidents.message: Start time : 03/06/2022 11:15 UTC End time : 03/06/2022 14:38 UTC Service impact : Openstack APIs on GRA7, GRA11 and DE1 regions did not work. Instances that operate in these two regions continued to work Our technical teams resolved the issues. APIs' usages has been restored to its state prior the event.
